attributes.title: Theme Design Skill
attributes.instructions:
## Structured Theme
- Base theme card defining cohesive tokens (palette, typography, spacing, radius, shadows, charts, sidebar) across light `:root` and dark `.dark` modes.
- Includes plain maps for `rootVariables` and `darkModeVariables`, plus compiled `cssVariables` (with `@theme inline`) so any card can consume the theme.
- Use OKLCH or Hex values with AA contrast and reference tokens with `var(--token, fallback)`.

## Style Reference (extends Structured Theme)
- Adds narrative context for the look and feel: `styleName`, `visualDNA`, inspirations, wallpaper imagery, and card metadata while still carrying all structured theme tokens and CSS.
- Use it when you want both the full token set and a short story for the mood; it stays compatible with any card that reads structured theme variables.

## Brand Guide (extends Style Reference)
- Adds brand assets and semantics on top of the style reference: marks/clearspace, heading/body typography stacks, named swatches and functional palette, plus all structured theme tokens and CSS.
- Use it to ship a complete brand kit that can theme any card while also documenting marks, fonts, and semantic colors for your org.
